description:
External rate limiting systems typically return a 429 http code rather that the 413 code currently used by the built-in rate limiter. 

The novaclient should be changed to also recognize this (which will also prepare it for the same change in the V3 API) 
https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1187676
title: novaclient should recognize 429 as an rate limiting status
